paper_abstract: Biological and medical intelligence (BMI) has been studied in solos, lacking a systematic methodology. In this paper, we describe how Semantic Computing can enhance biological and medical intelligence. Specifically, we show how Structured Natural Language (SNL) can express many problems in BMI with a finite number of sentence patterns, and show how biological tools, OLAP, data mining tools and statistical analysis tools may be linked to solve problems related to biomedical data.
